definition: the last few years/last several years/recent years

sentences.english: But recently some people presented a new algebraic diagonalization method.
sentences.chinese: 最近有人提出一种新的代数对角化方法。

sentences.english: The four-letter words were always edited out of radio scripts until quite recently.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近广播稿中的庸俗词语才让保留下来。

sentences.english: Vietnam also has reported recent cases of blue ear decease ( disease ).
sentences.chinese: 越南也报告说最近发现蓝耳猪的病例。

sentences.english: Usually, galaxies this topsy-turvy result from a recent collision with a neighboring galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 通常星系这种乱七八糟是最近与邻近星系碰撞的结果。

sentences.english: The last was opened in Dalian in Liaoning province in February this year.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一家去年二月在辽宁大连开张。

sentences.english: Enter the recently named Vice President, Lieut.
sentences.chinese: 输入最近任命为副总裁，上尉。

sentences.english: The nearest hand belonged to Angela
A lecturer in the English Department has recently been refused tenure .
sentences.chinese: 英语系一名讲师最近未能获得终身职位。

sentences.english: That has since calmed down and the markets have gotten even quieter lately.
sentences.chinese: 此后市场逐渐平静下来，最近已变得更为平静了。

sentences.english: Hence its mixed results and recent stagnation.
sentences.chinese: 因此它混淆了结果和最近的停滞。

sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他们最近还在实施另两个旨在让家庭走向户外的项目。

sentences.english: Yet it is only recently that we have truly turned from a whaling civilization to a whale-watching one.
sentences.chinese: 但我们真正从一种捕鲸文明转向观鲸文明还是在最近。

sentences.english: She has made so many passes at me recently that I think it necessary to freeze her off.
sentences.chinese: 最近她多次向我抛送秋波，我觉得有必要疏远她。

sentences.english: His latest biographer, Mr. More, has been more candid.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的传记作者，莫尔先生则较为坦诚一些。
相反，犹他最近13场却输了10场。

sentences.english: A recent discovery has revealed another form of blue Tiberium.
sentences.chinese: 最近的研究发现了另一种蓝色泰伯利亚的新形态。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
the last few years/last several years/recent years
